body_html:
Clone tensorflow including submodules
git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow

Check out release 1.1 instead of using master branch
git checkout remotes/origin/r1.1

Set path variables as @yaroslavvb mentioned:
export CUDA_HOME=/usr/local/cuda
export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib:/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH
export PATH=$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH:$PATH

For OSX Sierra 10.12.4:
Use XCode 7.2

I documented the whole installation here:
https://gist.github.com/to-bee/6d19b7fa0d68ee97407591de1586da62

Clone tensorflow including submodules

Check out release 1.1 instead of using master branch
git checkout remotes/origin/r1.1
Set path variables as @yaroslavvb mentioned:
export CUDA_HOME=/usr/local/cuda
export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib:/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH
export PATH=$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH:$PATH
For OSX Sierra 10.12.4:
Use XCode 7.2
I documented the whole installation here:
https://gist.github.com/to-bee/6d19b7fa0d68ee97407591de1586da62
body:
Clone tensorflow including submodules
git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow

Check out release 1.1 instead of using master branch
git checkout remotes/origin/r1.1

Set path variables as @yaroslavvb mentioned:
export CUDA_HOME=/usr/local/cuda
export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib:/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH
export PATH=$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH:$PATH

For OSX Sierra 10.12.4:
Use XCode 7.2 

I documented the whole installation here:
https://gist.github.com/to-bee/6d19b7fa0d68ee97407591de1586da62
